dmca.title: Claims of Copyright Infringement (Second Notice!)
dmca.body:
_____  

From: MARK MCKOOL [mailto:mark@markmckool.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 10, 2006 2:30 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Jennifer Korbin
Subject: Claims of Copyright Infringement (Second Notice!)
Importance: High


ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, 
Dallas, TX 75207

(214) 782-7800
(214) 782-7756 (facsimile)


Notice of Claimed Copyright Infringement

My client Jennifer Korbin is requesting the removal of mentioned material,
from a site hosted on theplanet.com servers, as it pertains to her company's
intellectual property. The images and files posted for download are without
the consent of Jennifer Korbin, or Jenniferkorbin.com. All material is in
fact copyrighted. Bikinibikini.com is in Violation of TOS and we are
submitting DMCA Notification at this time. Per TOS bikinibikini.com is
infringing on the rights of multitudes by allowing the publishing of
Copyrighted materials possibly at bikinibikini.com's own monetary benefit.
My Client Jennifer Korbin is growing tired of being forced to monitor this
website (bikinibikini.com) to insure that the rights of her company are not
infringed. As a result of this type of Image Hijacking Jenniferkorbin.com
has experienced lost revenue from it's own site.
 
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:
 
-ALL JENNIFER KORBIN IMAGES LOCATED ON THE LINKS BELOW-
 
The material that is the subject of the infringing activity and that is to
be removed or access to which is to be disabled by theplanet.com is located
in link below.

Re: Jennifer Korbin Sets (multiple copyrighted works)

One illegal thread consisting of 34+ pages / in excess of 334 posts that
contain massive amounts of copyrighted images and video downloads.

http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread10139.html


The complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material in
the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its
agent, or law. The information in this notification is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 
Cordially,

<Mark McKool> 

Mark McKool
P.O. BOX 701927
Dallas TX 75370-1927
972-818-6966
mark@markmckool.com
korbinkompany@aol.com
